entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
